predictions.text: Herbalife, as well as certain third parties that provide content and other functionality on our Sites, use cookies, web beacons, session replay/screen capture, and other similar technologies for various purposes, including to analyze trends, administer the website, track users’ movements around the Sites and to gather demographic information about our user base as a whole.
predictions.description: Tracking pixels and/or device fingerprinting

predictions.text: Web beacons and similar technologies are small bits of code, which are embedded in web pages, advertisements, and e-mails, that communicate with third parties.
predictions.description: Tracking pixels and/or device fingerprinting

predictions.text: We use web beacons, for example, to count the number of users who have visited a particular web page, to deliver or communicate with cookies, and to understand usage patterns.
predictions.description: Tracking pixels and/or device fingerprinting

predictions.text: We also may include web beacons in e-mails to understand whether messages have been opened, acted on, or forwarded.
predictions.description: Tracking pixels and/or device fingerprinting

predictions.text: Web browsers may allow you to send “Do Not Track” requests
predictions.description: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway.

predictions.text: We do not currently take actions to respond to Do Not Track signals because there is no current industry standard concerning what, if anything, websites should do when they receive such signals
predictions.description: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway.
